entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assertion failed. Unexpected exception type for connection failure when some Http tests time out #62508
  • [API Proposal]: System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.StringLanguageAttribute #62505
    7.0.0
  • [mono] Enable DispatchProxyTests.DispatchProxyTests.Test_Unloadability #62503
    7.0.0
  • Feature Request: New performance counter for total bytes allocated #62498
  • Documenting Issue Triage and Pull Request workflows #62496
  • [API Proposal]: One shot hashing of `Stream` #62489
  • Add libclang to Microsoft.NETCore.Runtime.Mono.LLVM.Sdk package #62485
    7.0.0
  • Missing symbols for System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe #62484
  • Libraries 7.0 (master) cross build failed for tizen armel #62478
  • [API Proposal]: Platform-aware Marshal.StringToHGlobalUni equivalent #62475
  • [API Proposal]: WebSocketException to expose the underlying HTTPResponse or the response status #62474
    7.0.0
  • Analyzer rule CA2255 is conceptually broken and needs to be removed. #62472
  • Runtime-dev-innerloop linux x64 debug all configurations failed with locked file #62471
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexMatchTests.StressTestDeepNestingOfLoops #62468
  • Test failure DllImportGenerator.UnitTests.Compiles.ValidateSnippetsFallbackForwarder(source: \"\\nusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;\\n\\nnamespa\"..., targetFramework: Standard, expectFallbackForwarder: False) #62467
    7.0.0
  • X86Base.CpuId is not user-friendly API #62466

Closed

  • [wasm] Linux/AOT tests(9) broken #62362
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Windows/AOT failing tests #62363
    7.0.0
  • [HTTP/2] HttpClient can't connect to Kestrel/other web-servers in HTTP/2 only mode #62473
  • Comparing method infos from expressions #62230
  • [macOS] Enable Process support on MacCatalyst #61504
    6.0.x
  • Process.Start() should be supported on MacCatalyst #61295
    6.0.x
  • Remove #ifs in System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter #62212
    Future
  • [iOS/tvOS] Test Failure System.IO.Compression.Tests.ZipFile_Unix.CanZipNamedPipe #62341
  • .ProcessName should use QueryFullProcessImageNameW or GetProcessImageFileNameW #55685
    7.0.0
  • Add tooling to automate signing iOS/tvOS apps when running tests locally #59717
    7.0.0
  • Create maui specific runtime branch #61736
    6.0.x
  • .net 6 blazor can't publish #62332
  • _LinkNativeExecutable target fails running net6.0-ios for simulator and device with native reference, works with older Xamarin.iOS #62410
    6.0.MAUI
  • Test failure Interop\\COM\\Activator\\ActivatorBuiltInComDisabled\\ActivatorBuiltInComDisabled.cmd #62067
    7.0.0
  • openSUSE - upgrade using 'zypper up' command upgrades 3.1 host to 6.0 and removes 'dotnet' command #61849
  • DateTime.ToString("d") cannot be parsed as a DateTime in Arabic #61708
    7.0.0
  • XslTransformException: Methods with same name and same number of parameters not allowed. #29053
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Match and isMatch ReadOnlySpan<char> overloads as well as Regex protected methods which expose ReadOnlySpan<char> to avoid allocations. #62509
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Escape lower-cased type names #62507
  • Enable max warnlevel from C# compiler #62506
  • Disable DispatchProxyTests.Test_Unloadability on Mono #62504
    area-System.Reflection
  • ci test #62502
  • [wasm] Use await on task when waiting for tests to complete #62501
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • [build] Create clr.host subset to remove patching step for mono runtime tests #62500
    area-Infrastructure
  • Initial changes for emscripten 2.0.34 #62499
    area-Build-mono
  • Support for devirtualizing array interface methods #62497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • System.IO.Stream: Decorate validation helpers with [NotNull] to fix CA1062 false positives #62494
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Update branding to 6.0.2 #62493
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 5.0.14 #62492
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Exclude DNNE based test project from armel builds #62486
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Put generated `InvalidClientHelloDataTruncatedBytes` data into one test #62480
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Reduce asyncstatemachine cost in readLineAsyncInternal. #62479
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • HTTP/3: QPACK decoder performance #62470
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Port changes from 6.0 for future servicing releases into main #62469
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix createdump failure on MacOS Monterey version 12.0.1 #62465
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Use "pipeline-caching" for coreclr and libraries builds #62464
  • Unblock tests in LINQ interpreter only mode #62463
    area-System.Dynamic.Runtime

Merged

  • [wasm] only trigger global compatibility mode when usage and configuration are global #62488
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Update area owners: carlossanlop changes area pods #62495
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Support Process.Start() on MacCatalyst #61507
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [mono] Fix samples building against wrong TFM #62491
    area-Build-mono
  • Remove #ifs in System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter #62364
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [mono] Remove unused defines from config.h.in #62490
    area-Build-mono
  • [arm64] JIT: X % 2 == 0 -> X & 1 == 0 #62399
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Notepad window title is uppercase on Windows 11 #62487
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • don't run CanZipNamedPipe test on iOS/tvOS #62477
    area-System.IO.Compression, test enhancement
  • Issue 55685 processname optimisation #59672
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix perf issues discovered in "For software performance, can you always trust inlining" blog #61408
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update windows-requirements.md #62476
    community-contribution
  • Clean up symlink tests #62087
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • More cleanup for source generator #62461
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Optimize XmlTextEncoder.Write #61773
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Convert System.DirectoryServices.Protocols and System.Drawing.Common to use GeneratedDllImport #62365
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Ensure all types are loaded when methods are accessed as function pointers #62158
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Symlink for dotnet host should be created at build time #62455
    area-Setup, 7.0.0
  • Renaming some local variables to make the generated code more readable #62460
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix Some Date and Time parsing cases #62376
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • Follow up to universal System.Linq.Expressions #62229
    area-System.Linq.Expressions

Updated

  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • Mark overflow fix for regions #60646
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Reduce number of calls to setTimer #62433
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Including FastFloat in parsing process #62301
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Enable memory-mapped stress log on cross platform #61123
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update build pool to macOS 11 #62294
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • S.IO.StringReader: Use ReadOnlySpan.IndexOfAny in ReadLine() for performance #60463
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] View object attributes - DebugType=full #62278
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix re-initialization of hash objects on CNG. #62403
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • CI matrix: add openSUSE 15.2 - second attempt #60161
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add Runtime portion of android startup scenario #61861
  • Add RegexGenerator to System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter. #62325
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • CI matrix: Add windows 20H2 - fix TLS1.3 issue #62435
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reenable Mono runtime tests on PRs #62437
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for mobile runtime tests #60879
  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Change all "unmanaged" (no GC fields) sequential types to have sequential layout. #61759
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Switch over miscellaneous DllImports to GeneratedDllImport. #62353
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Remove string allocation from XmlTextEncoder.WriteCharEntity #61774
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Add additional binary operations into the RangeCheck analysis. #61662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Switch over Loader/classloader/TypeGeneratorTests to use merged wrappers #61942
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fixing a possible null reference error in WebSocket deflate. #62428
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix XmlSchema does not correctly validate xs:NMTOKENS type restrictions with enumeration #60544
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Add ConstantExpectedAttribute #62436
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Delete `gtEvalSizeFirst` #62330
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: handle more cases for MOD/DIV -> UMOD/UDIV transformation #62394
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP: Initial implementation of the ILPROJ analyzer utility to assist the planned runtime test refactoring #60984
  • Re-enable IJW tests on Win7 #56960
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Avoid deadlock with ConfigurationManager #62209
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • PE loader/image investigations #61938
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Use SIMD operations in InitBlkUnroll/CopyBlkUnroll and increase unroll limit up to 128 bytes #61030
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Directory.Delete: prefer DirectoryNotFoundException over UnauthorizedAccess IOException. #62396
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Allow CreateScalarUnsafe to be directly contained by hwintrinsics that support scalar loads #62407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 #61934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: refactor arm64 epilog generation #62381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add support for running debugger tests CI #62431
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Embedded version of NuGet client does not respect "no_proxy" configuration #22942

  • msbuild publish fails for runtime target win-x86 #22928

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnC: Multi-line active statement span not calculated properly #58179
  • GetValEscape doesn't handle BoundArgList #58177
  • LocalRewriter adds placeholder of wrong type when building `runtime` repo #58176
  • IDE Refactoring: Add interpolated string handler members #58174
  • IDE0004 reported incorrectly for a delegate cast #58171
  • Handling `AggressiveDefaultsMatchingOption` for completion #58169
  • IDE0060 (unused parameter) shouldn't report unused InterpolatedStringHandler parameters #58168
  • Heavy allocation in formatting an unused error message #58165
    17.1
  • Stack Trace Explorer to surface the option to close each Stack Trace tab #58164
  • Completion suggesting names after typing event name #58162
  • Ref with null suppression operator is not considered a value write #58161
  • Strange behavior when passing `null` for ReadOnlyMemory/ReadOnlySpan #58160
  • Separate `PerformanceSensitiveAnalyzers` version from `Roslyn.Diagnostics.Analyzeres` #58159
  • IDE0055 in target-typed new with collection initializers #58157
  • CultureInfo enum #58156
  • *.resources FileNotFoundException, this is nonsense. #58155
  • NormalizeWhitespace method has a bug. #58150
  • Unify INotifyPropertyChanged implementation in Roslyn XAML+ layers #58148
  • Find All References & Go to Implementation/Base to include external references #58147
  • Go To All to include external types #58146
  • .NET Productivity tools delights customers #58145

Closed

  • IActionResult Un-necessary Casting with Ternary Expression #21405
    Backlog
  • Cast coercion from byte to int reported redundant #54447
    Backlog
  • Unexpected IL for a list pattern over an array #57728
    17.1
  • Emit ldlen in pattern matching on arrays #56199
    17.1
  • CS8618 should not happen on static classes #58151
  • SyntaxToken.GetLocation().GetLineSpan() crashes with an ArgumentOutOfRangeException when visiting XmlTextLiteralNewLineToken #57413
    17.1
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking APIs #54832
    17.0
  • Compiler or analyzer should warn for lower-cased type names #56653
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Add test demonstrating issue does not repro. #58178
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Reduce the memory usage of InheritanceMarginTarget #58175
    Area-IDE
  • Use interpolated string handler for Contract.ThrowIf methods #58173
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update instructions for building runtime repo #58172
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58163
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Analyzers to 3.3.3 #58154
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Use ElasticSpace instead of ElasticZeroSpace #58152
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Add missing delegate casts #58170
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58167
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58166
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Report a level 7 warning for lower-cased type names #56905
    Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Use `ldlen` to get array's Length during pattern-matching. #58114
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, New Feature - Extended Property Patterns, Next
  • Update publishdata.json to point to correct VS branch #58142
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Implement Naming Styles for editorconfig UI #58075
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, Needs UX Triage
  • Adjust doc comment for `SyntaxFactory.ParseTokens` API #58064
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58153
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58149
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58139
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Run builds with $TempDir redirected to a new drive #58105
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58144
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58143
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58181
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58180
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Simplify lazy initialization in RazorDocumentServiceProviderWrapper #58063
    Area-IDE
  • Use !! in AddParameterCheck refactoring #57934
    Area-IDE
  • Inline Hints: Added double click on hint to insert text #55737
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints
  • List patterns: Skip compiler-generated dag nodes for better codegen #57909
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Handling defaults provided by IAsyncCompletionDefaultsSource #57685
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid calculating inferred delegate type unnecessarily in conversions and type inference #58115
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Make GetDocumentWithFrozenPartialSemantics asynchronous #57830
    Area-IDE
  • Port CSharpCodeActions and CSharpFindReferences to the new test harness #58037
    Area-IDE
  • Method group conversion caching redo #57882
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for nullable analysis in interpolated string handler constructors #57780
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix all RS1034 (Prefer 'IsKind' for checking syntax kinds) #51823
    Area-Compilers, Blocked
  • Add external access to stacktrace APIs for Unit Testing #58082
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58069
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Compiler crashing issues reported through internal telemetry #38879
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Compiler crashing issues reported through internal telemetry #38878
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Compiler crashing issues reported through internal telemetry #38877
    .NET 7 Planning
  • NET 6 - Minimal APIs Docker Error M1 Macbook Pro #38876
  • Perf regression: caching, multiple_queries #38874
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #38873
  • JsonPatch test operation error message has values not used in the actual test #38872
    Backlog
  • Windows Service does not take settings from appsettings.json #38870
  • CascadingTypeParameter incorrectly infers reference type nullability #38862
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Solutions with a standalone JavaScript project and an asp.net web API project seems tied to visual studio / windows #38861
  • Blazor app fails to run with JS error "Failed to invoke 'StartCircuit' due to an error on the server" #38859
  • WebApplicationBuilder should not Require wwwroot Directory #38857
  • Issue comparing decimals in JsonPatch tests #38856
    Backlog

Closed

  • Blazor Wasm: Guidance on updating integrity digest of blazor.boot.json after renaming .dll files #38691
  • Blazor Debug `Failed to attach to process: Unknown Error: 0x80131c69` #38790
  • Stop using loose typing in a strongly typed language #37368
    Discussions
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #38847
  • RedisCache Broken in .NET 6 Web Application #38866
  • RuntimeBinderException: 'System.Dynamic.DynamicObject' does not contain a definition for 'UserName' #38863
  • Instruction pointer stays in commented out code after hot reload #38846

PullRequests

Created

  • Turn off parallelization on new long iis tests #38881
    area-runtime
  • Avoid sending a PR if there's already one open #38880
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http: Decorate priorFeature as nullable on StreamResponseBodyFeature ctor #38875
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Try alpine 315 #38871
    area-infrastructure
  • Enable template localization on dotnet CLI #38867
    area-mvc
  • Port of Bootstrap v4 SxS support to 7.0 #38865
    area-identity
  • Fix RedisCache update that breaks usage against older redis servers #38860
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/3.1] Move off of expiring machine pools #38534
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/6.0] Resolve component governance bugs #38539
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.1
  • [release/5.0] Move off of expiring machine pools #38532
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Update Docker images, queues, etc. #38563
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.1
  • [release/6.0] Use window.document for React-Native #38598
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 6.0.1
  • [release/5.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4848324` to `bb92160` #38753
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4848324` to `bb92160` #38754
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • Backport Blazor Fix Missing EventArgs.Type (#38792) to 6.0.2 #38811
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.1
  • Backport `components-e2e` CI Pipeline Fixes to release/6.0 #38815
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.1
  • Update branding to 5.0.14 #38868
    area-infrastructure, 5.0.x
  • Update branding to 6.0.2 #38869
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.1
  • Update branding to 3.1.23 #38864
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • HTTP/3: QPACK decoder performance #38826
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Support overriding AuthorizeFilter.OnAuthorizationAsync(context) in more cases #38851
    area-mvc
  • Using DictionaryKeyPolicy during ProblemDetails.Errors conversion to JSON #38853
    area-mvc
  • [release/2.1] Move off of expiring machine pools #38536
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • StatusCodes doc: Mention GetReasonPhrase in remarks #38852
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT][wasm] dotnet.js modularization #38721
    area-blazor
  • ContentResult doc: add links to properties #38828
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • HTTP/2: Improve incoming header performance #38834
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor MAUI - Camera/Microphone Android - NotAllowedError: Permission denied #3694
  • Versioning my Maui Android App raise multiple errors #3690
  • iOS binding library project template #3688
  • [Windows] The DesiredSize doesn't get the proper size. #3687
  • Docs: How to debug Blazor hybrid apps #3685
  • Docs: Blazor hybrid walkthrough / getting started #3684

Closed

  • RandomNumberGenerator.GetInt32 throws DllNotFoundException on iOS #3505
  • [Bug] 'DllNotFoundException: libcoreclr.so' when I attempt to perform a login through iOS #3406
  • BlazorWebView -> Unable to customize Blazor Startup #3644
  • Epic: Blazor developers can target and deploy their applications to desktop platforms, allowing them to run natively #2536
  • Build, run, debug Blazor hybrid desktop apps using the development platform #2535
  • Blazor Desktop docs plan #2530

PullRequests

Created

  • Window extend toolbar #3693
  • Return a blank Label when LoadTemplate is null to prevent Hot Reload crashes #3692
  • Fix ProjectRenference for Contorls targeting/runtime pack projects #3689

Merged

  • Fix warnings from #3519 #3656
    area/layout 🔲
  • Bump JDK to JDK 11 #3674
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3683
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [android] reduce JNI calls by moving logic into Java #3372
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Add FormattedText property support to Label in Controls #3637
    area/controls 🎮
  • Fix publishing WPF/WinForms Blazor apps with MSIX #3582
    area/blazor 🕸️, feature-blazor-windesktop, feature-blazor-sdk
  • Add BlazorWebView device tests and fix Android file provider bug #3612
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Implement CursorPosition in IEditor/ITextInput Handlers #3196
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Proposal: Better exception message for "Nullable object must have a value." #26934
  • Generated query has extra non-existent column with suffix 1 #26924
  • Query/Test: temporal table query infra doesn't work when using Set of entity that is not root inside lambda #26922
  • A DbContext instance cannot be used inside OnConfiguring since it is still being configured at this point #26920
  • Repeated typo in PropertyAccessMode Enum documentation #26923
    MQ

Closed

  • Why EF is disponsing Context and Closing/Opening new connections in a Single Command #26850
  • Poor useability of EF Core as compared to EF 6 #26874
  • Installing EF Core on a .Net Core 3.1 Project? #26872
  • Progress on #24889: EF read operation kills app consistently after 535 accesses.... #26868
  • The instance of entity type 'Unit' cannot be tracked because another instance with the same key value for {'IdUnidade' } is already being tracked. #26848
  • Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SqlException (0x80131904): Invalid object name '[Production].[WorkOrder]'. #26836
  • The LINQ expression could not be translated after upgrading from EF Core 5 to EF Core 6 #26825
  • How to query if a varbinary has a byte value? #26809
  • SqlServerMathTranslator exception #26878
  • How to compare entity new values with current database values? #26839
  • Error with dotnet ef tools when using a combo of HasKey and HasNoKey #26823

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #26933
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26932
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #26931
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Static analysis: replace tail recursion with loop #26926
  • Static analysis: spelling #26925
  • Static analysis: inconsistent naming and namespaces #26919

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Update to Mac OS 11 image #26739
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/5.0] Update to Mac OS 11 image #26738
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/3.1] Update to Mac OS 11 image #26737
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Static analysis: use null propagation #26918
  • Static analysis: redundancies in symbol declarations #26921
  • Static analysis: miscellaneous "code quality" #26930
  • Update branding to 3.1.23 #26927
  • Update branding to 5.0.14 #26928
  • Update branding to 6.0.2 #26929
  • Static analysis: conditional cleanup #26915
  • Static analysis: Use ??= #26916

Updated

  • Log warning when credentials used for reverse enigineering does not have view definition rights #26776
  • Query: Add multiple parameters if inferred type mapping differs #26582
    auto-merge
  • Fixup navigations to/from join entity when new many-to-many relationship is created #26853
  • Adding support for owned types mapped to same table as well as different tables #26706
